code: import axios from'axios';import{useEffect,useState}from'react';const useFetchUser=()=>{const[user,setUser]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const loginUser=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.post('/userdb/user');setUser(response.data);}catch(error){console.error(error);}};loginUser();},[]);return{user};};export default useFetchUser;
